dt-api.name: searchBuilder.rebuild()
dt-api.summary: Rebuild the search to a given state

type.description: Rebuilds the search to be the same as that provided by the details parameter.
type.parameter: Object to the same structure as `-api searchBuilder.getDetails()`
type.returns: Object containing the current details of the search

dt-api.description:
This method provides the ability to get the set the search in SearchBuilder as detailed by the details argument.
`-init searchBuilder.rebuild()` takes one argument, it is an object in the same structure as is returned from `-api searchBuilder.getDetails()` and is the basis for the rebuild.
